meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Keith Level Sarah Lehman Cigus Vanni Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1003.

td.p: Keith Level, a community college teacher originally from Ventura, California
Sarah Lehman, an editorial assistant originally from Vancouver, British Columbia
Cigus Vanni, a psychologist from Bala Cynwyd, Pennsylvania (whose 3-day cash winnings total $23,600)

tr.td: PHYSICAL SCIENCE
NUMERICAL PHRASES
SPORTSCASTERS
MOVIE TRIVIA
JULIA CHILD SAYS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A heliocentric model of the solar system has this at its center')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A heliocentric model of the solar system has this at its center

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Cigus: Who are Tricia Nixon & David Eisenhower?)
(Keith: Who are Tricia Nixon & Cox?)
...
(Alex: [*] and Mr. Eisenhower.)

Julie Nixon* & David Eisenhower

CigusKeith
Triple Stumper
')

CigusSarah
')

Maryland & Pennsylvania')

Sarah
Keith

3 W
(including 1 DD)
